data.title: Jan Hofmann
data.meta_description: Jan Hofmann is Top Program Lead AI / Digital Processes in the Technology & Innovation division.
data.text:
Jan Hofmann is Top Program Lead AI / Digital Processes in the Technology & Innovation division. He is responsible for DT's digital transformation products, with a strong focus on the use of Artificial Intelligence ("AI Enterprise" innovation program).

Jan Hofmann joined Deutsche Telekom in 2008, initially working in corporate strategy. He subsequently became Head of Video Advertising, and later VP Product at subsidiary company InteractiveMedia, before taking up his current role in 2015. Prior to 2008, he worked for a startup, at Daimler, and at Deutsche Bank. He studied physics and product design, and was awarded his doctorate in the field of Human Computer Interaction.
